Reviews.Content: Fine place to stay in Berlin It was very clean, the staff were friendly and spoke some English. Our room (room 1) was large with a bay window, very light and sunny and had a sofa and easy chair as well as twin/double bed. The bathroom was fine - shower (no bath) and loo. None of it was up-to-date. It could be a fantastic spot if done up. The floors creaked badly but no one seemed to stay above us ( I think it might have been offices) so it didn't worry us. There was some traffic noise but there were double windows keeping the worst out. Breakfast was ok - the usual self service continental food and drink. We loved the old building and being in a hotel that wasn't a modern block, at a reasonable rate. Position was very good.
Reviews.Author: Candyjo
